name: Draw it yourself !
description:
It looks like there is a little delay on sounds on Firefox with the HTML version. Try another browser or download the game to play it if you can :)

Made for the "I Can't Draw But Want To Make A Game" jam

A very short game where the player can draw his own images

Controls

X Button to attack

Left / Right Arrow keys to move

Up Arrow key to jump

Credits

All recources were created during the jam

Coding and sound design by Mastoast

Visuals by Mastoast and you, if you played the game

Font used : Gidole regular

Game made with Godot Engine 3.1

Visuals made with paint.net

Sound design and musics made with Audacity and LMMS

Thanks to Newiy for his incredible voice performances
